Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <torsten1> Important question, thanks for asking. As you can read in the announcement we used the same vulnerability the hacker planned to use. This vulnerability only affected a subset of specific wallets created by / imported to Agama in the last 4 months. It‚Äôs an Agama vulnerability, not a ‚ÄúKomodo hack‚Äù (re @Heretic: How can I trust some coin that team can take my money from my wallet and put it to their wallet?)
